docs.snippet: Reality took a beating from the Washington blame game this past week. Americans heard about a Kentucky massacre that never happened, a travel ban that was a ban despite it being called something else, and a dark plot to help Russian intelligence t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Reality took a beating from the Washington blame game this past week. Americans heard about a Kentucky massacre that never happened, a travel ban that was a ban despite it being called something else, and a dark plot to help Russian intelligence that was nothing of the sort. A look at some of the ways political figures strayed into fiction:

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: A Week's Supply of Baloney
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: A Week's Supply of Baloney

docs.snippet: Judge Neil Gorsuch recalls being blinded by tears in the middle of a ski run after someone rang his cellphone with news of the unexpected death of Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia. The reaction illustrates not only the depth of Gorsuch's admir...
docs.lead_paragraph: Judge Neil Gorsuch recalls being blinded by tears in the middle of a ski run after someone rang his cellphone with news of the unexpected death of Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia. The reaction illustrates not only the depth of Gorsuch's admiration for his mentor but also how thoroughly he has modeled his conservative constitutionalist views after Scalia.

headline.main: Trump's Supreme Court Pick Wary of 'Politicians With Robes'
headline.print_headline: Trump's Supreme Court Pick Wary of 'Politicians With Robes'

docs.snippet: Prosecutors in Peru were preparing to request the arrest of former president Alejandro Toledo on Saturday after uncovering evidence that implicates him in $20 million (£16 million) in bribes that the Brazilian conglomerate Odebrecht has ackno...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Peru were preparing to request the arrest of former president Alejandro Toledo on Saturday after uncovering evidence that implicates him in $20 million (£16 million) in bribes that the Brazilian conglomerate Odebrecht has acknowledged distributing to win a contract during his government, a source said.

headline.main: Peru to Seek Arrest of Ex President Toledo in Mega Graft Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Peru to Seek Arrest of Ex President Toledo in Mega Graft Inquiry
